name: Refugity
description:
What if a refugee crisis happened in your country?
Find out by discovering the highly sophisticated strategy-simulation of Refugity!
Based on real world data, playing ‘Refugity’ becomes an fun, intellectual and interesting experience. See how big the regional and global impact of migration can be.
The goal: By opening and closing countries as well as upgrading services like transportation, the player has to guide all displaced people out of their ‘source’ country and resettle them in a safe place somewhere abroad.

- Over 150 interactable countries world wide!
- 25 unique levels!
- Sandbox Mode!
- Simulation based on real world economic data.
- Utilize unique strategies for each level.
- Manage political, educational and transportation services!
- Over 1 billion people waiting for resettlement!
- 100% indie!

Involuntary migration is nothing to be casual about. In 2016 there will be almost 60 Million displaced people in this world.*
This game is ment to provide awareness to those who have the opportunity to live a life in more stable countries rather than making it a fun occation to push people around. And in the end of the day by thinking at the people who need shelter, we’ve grown a little bit torwards a global, more open and safer society.
